## Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you would like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem or use case that this feature would solve. Why is this feature important to you?

**Example scenario:**
As a [type of user], I want [some goal] so that [some reason].

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working. Be as detailed as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe alternative solutions or features you've considered. Why would your proposed solution be better?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.

## Impact

Who would benefit from this feature? How would it improve the project?

- [ ] End users (test writers)
- [ ] Developers integrating the library
- [ ] CI/CD pipelines
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Implementation Notes

(Optional) If you have ideas about how this could be implemented technically, share them here. This is especially helpful if you're interested in contributing the feature yourself.
